thread.title: Kenya's Chumba, Kiplagat win titles at Chicago Marathon

title: Kenya's Chumba, Kiplagat win titles at Chicago Marathon
text:
> Top News Kenya's Chumba, Kiplagat win titles at Chicago Marathon Dickson Chumba, of Kenya, celebrates after winning the 2015 Bank of America Chicago Marathon, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Paul Beaty) Search Help
